::DrillBit::

He nodded to KitKat, and went off. He saw the sparkle in her eyes. He
wanted to get his work done, then spend some time with her.

::Demolition::

He headed out with the other War Machines.

::Hot Rod::

He actually continued to sleep, even though the part of the base he was
in was on the move.
